definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Felsic gneiss is the most widely distributed rock type in Archean metamorphic complex areas.
sentences.chinese: 长英质片麻岩是太古宙变质杂岩区最主要的岩石类型。

sentences.english: They are regarded as being enveloped in regenerated gneisses.
sentences.chinese: 它们被认为包围在再生的片麻岩之中。

sentences.english: Lanshantou gneiss suit formed under the crust extensional environment at post collision setting.
sentences.chinese: 碰撞造山后期地壳伸展，形成岚山头片麻岩套。

sentences.english: The majority of their protolithes are biotite rich peraluminous gneisses.
sentences.chinese: 多数古成体原岩是富黑云母的过铝质片麻岩。

sentences.english: The gneiss has been altered in to yellow-grey rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 片麻岩蚀变后呈黄褐色块体。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
